game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and Retrieve the Lost Artifact
game.description: A powerful artifact has been lost in the ancient ruins. Your mission is to find and retrieve this artifact. Beware of the creatures guarding the relic.

tasks.description: Use the provided map to find the ancient ruins. Be prepared to face minor resistance.
Find the artifact within the ruins. It is greatly guarded by ancient creatures.
